videos.title: This really shouldn't be legal in Standard
videos.description:

videos.author: CovertGoBlue
videos.title: Saving mtg's IP  CovertGoPodcast
videos.description:
Crim aka TheAsianAvenger on Twitch mega troll and card game nerd. This week we talk about what Magic: The Gathering can do to grow it's fan base and how MTG YouTube content can adjust to that changing audience, including how to combat the YouTube Algorithm. We also talk about some Standard Foundations metagame decks, what CGB used to reach Mythic rank this month, and CGB's first Flip & Rip experience on Dripshop.live.

Sponsors
